title: Oru Chinna Thamarai Lyrics vettaikaran Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Oru Chinna Thamarai Song Lyrics

You gotta keep moving if you out with your drama
This is many of the ? you wanna get with me mama
You can see me bowling by looking at me sneakers
And my credit card got really good features
Oru Chinna Thamarai Yen kannil poothadhe
Andha minnal vartaigal yen ullam thedi thayikindrathe
Idha unmai enbadha illa poi thaan enbadha
Yen degham muluvadhum
Oru venmin kuttam moyikindrathe
En roma kalghalo
Oru payanam poghuthe
Un eera punnagai sudhuthe
En kaatu padhaiyil
Nee otrai poovada
Un vaasam thaakiye malarnthen uyire

Yen kangal aalai modhum
Un vaasa thedi pogha cholli kenjuthu en paadam

Un kangal ennai neyum
Naan ettanai naalai yeluthiya kovuram en kuda madiyil kodaisayum
Un kaigal thorkamal payanangal kedayathu
Unnodhu vandhale saalaigal mudiyathu…
